definition: Whitney Houston (1963-2012), American singer and actress
pinyin: Hui4 te4 ni1 · Xiu1 si1 dun4

definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
